definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Legends are still needed in certain cases.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情况下，图例仍然是必需的。

sentences.english: Here I used our green swatch, again with 1px and simulate pressure on.
sentences.chinese: 在此图例里，我用了1像素的笔刷并选择了模拟压力。

sentences.english: The color coding of the label is to act as a legend for the graph.
sentences.chinese: 标签的颜色编码用于充当该图的图例。

sentences.english: Description of vegetation is according to orienteering legends.
sentences.chinese: 日记内对植被的形容，可参考定向图例。

sentences.english: For example, are the illustrations below considered shapes?
sentences.chinese: 例如，下面这些图例是否能看作形状呢？

sentences.english: Below is an illustration of our current sign up button.
sentences.chinese: 下面便是我们当前注册按钮的图例。

sentences.english: On traditional print maps, the legend serves as a translator for the symbols used.
sentences.chinese: 在传统的印刷地图中，图例是作为符号解释器使用的。

sentences.english: The mender recommends me to amend the legend agenda.
sentences.chinese: 修理的人建议我改正图例操作规程。

sentences.english: Contextual windows eliminate the need for legends in many online maps.
sentences.chinese: 许多在线地图的上下文窗口减少了图例的使用。

sentences.english: Using information provided in the map legend.

definition: illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram
a plan/a planar graph/a plane figure
